title: Le Cordon Bleu Home Collection: Chicken
features: From the world's most famous cooking school comes a collection of cookbooks featuring fresh, modern dishes for the home cook. Simple, elegant recipes for all occasions are illustrated with color photos and step-by-step techniques. 30 full-page color photos.
description: "A series that has gone to great lengths to keep ingredients and techniques required within the reach of anyone" --
